lines: I know there's been this one thing
that you've not been able play, because we don't have a gaming pc.
So... as my gift to you, I'd like to give you what I made with surveys and a bank bonus
as a budget for a computer, or for something else if you like.
The budget is $800 ðŸ’µ, plenty for a pc that can CRUSH the Sims 4
I laid out some options in this app for you to choose from.
When you pick, I'll order the parts and put it together.
